HyperDbg is almost completely OS-Independent. However, some of its part aren't (e.g.: the installation driver). In this page we will keep and updated record of the development status of Windows version.

= Windows Support =

Windows XP is the first system HyperDbg was developed for, but even if it is still under development, this version of HyperDbg is stabler than the one used under Linux.

So far we have tested it on different hardware and emulated machines running the following versions of Windows:
 * Windows XP SP2
 * Windows XP SP3
